<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="pt-BR">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Disparos de Mensagens</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        body {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a1a 100%);
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            color: white;
            min-height: 100vh;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .app-layout {
            display: flex;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }

        /* Sidebar */
        .sidebar {
            width: 70px;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1000;
        }

        .sidebar:hover {
            width: 250px;
        }

        .sidebar-header {
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }

        .sidebar-logo {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .sidebar:hover .sidebar-logo {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .sidebar-menu {
            padding: 20px 0;
        }

        .menu-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 15px 20px;
            color: #ccc;
            text-decoration: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .menu-item:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .menu-item.active {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            border-right: 3px solid #25d366;
        }

        .menu-icon {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            width: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .menu-text {
            margin-left: 15px;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        }

        .sidebar:hover .menu-text {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        /* Main content */
        .main-content-wrapper {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px;
            overflow-x: auto;
        }

        .container {
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }

        .header {
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }

        .header-info h1 {
            font-size: 2.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: white;
        }

        .header-info p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
        }

        .main-content {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 400px;
            gap: 40px;
        }

        .form-container {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 40px;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }

        .form-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 30px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .form-group {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .form-group.full-width {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
        }

        .form-group label {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
        }

        .form-group input,
        .form-group textarea {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            outline: none;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .form-group input:focus,
        .form-group textarea:focus {
            border-color: #25d366;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .form-group input::placeholder,
        .form-group textarea::placeholder {
            color: #888;
        }

        .form-group textarea {
            resize: vertical;
            min-height: 100px;
        }

        .messages-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .message-item {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .message-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .message-title {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .remove-message {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-message:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.2);
        }

        .media-upload {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 10px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .media-preview-section {
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .media-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .media-info-display {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .media-icon-display {
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .media-name-display {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .media-size-display {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .remove-media-btn {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
            padding: 5px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-media-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.2);
        }

        .media-btn {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 12px 8px;
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
        }

        .media-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border-color: #25d366;
        }

        .media-btn input[type="file"] {
            position: absolute;
            opacity: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .media-btn.active {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-color: #25d366;
            color: #25d366;
        }

        .add-message-btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 15px;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 2px dashed rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .add-message-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-color: #25d366;
        }

        .time-range {
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
            align-items: center;
        }

        .time-input {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .time-separator {
            color: #888;
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            padding: 0 5px;
        }

        .file-upload {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 30px;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-radius: 12px;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .file-upload:hover {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
        }

        .file-upload.dragover {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
        }

        .file-upload input[type="file"] {
            position: absolute;
            opacity: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .file-upload-content {
            text-align: center;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .file-upload-icon {
            font-size: 3rem;
            color: #25d366;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        .file-upload-text {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .file-upload-hint {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .file-info {
            display: none;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 15px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .file-info.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .file-info-content {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }

        .file-details {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .file-icon {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .file-name {
            color: #fff;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .contact-count {
            color: #25d366;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .remove-file {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: #ff3b30;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
            padding: 5px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .remove-file:hover {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
        }

        .dispatch-btn {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 18px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #25d366 0%, #128c7e 100%);
            border: none;
            border-radius: 12px;
            color: white;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            margin-top: 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .dispatch-btn:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
        }

        .dispatch-btn:disabled {
            background: #444;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
            box-shadow: none;
        }

        .loading-connections {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
        }

        .loading-spinner-large {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border: 3px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            border-top: 3px solid #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin: 0 auto 15px;
        }

        .connections-section {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .connections-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 12px;
            margin-top: 15px;
        }

        .connection-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 16px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 80px;
        }

        .connection-card:hover {
            border-color: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.4);
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.05);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
        }

        .connection-card.selected {
            border-color: #25d366;
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
        }

        .connection-card.selected::before {
            content: '‚úì';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            background: #25d366;
            color: white;
            width: 18px;
            height: 18px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            font-weight: bold;
        }

        .connection-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            position: relative;
            padding-right: 30px;
        }

        .connection-avatar {
            width: 36px;
            height: 36px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #25d366;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1rem;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }

        .connection-avatar img {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            object-fit: cover;
        }

        .connection-info {
            flex: 1;
            min-width: 0;
        }

        .connection-name {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 0.95rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            line-height: 1.2;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .connection-phone {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-weight: 400;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }

        .connection-status-pill {
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            font-size: 0.65rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.3px;
            line-height: 1;
        }

        .connection-status-pill.connected {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.15);
            color: #34c759;
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.3);
        }

        .connection-status-pill.disconnected {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.15);
            color: #ff3b30;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
        }

        .connections-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 6px;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn-small {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 4px 8px;
            border-radius: 4px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn-small:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .connections-selected {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.08);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            border-radius: 6px;
            padding: 12px;
            margin-top: 12px;
            display: none;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
        }

        .connections-selected.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .no-connections {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px 20px;
            color: #888;
            border: 2px dashed rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.3);
            color: #25d366;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            margin-left: 10px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn:hover {
            background: rgba(37, 211, 102, 0.2);
            transform: rotate(180deg);
        }

        .refresh-connections-btn:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
            transform: none;
        }

        .dispatch-btn.loading .loading-spinner {
            display: block;
        }

        .success-message,
        .error-message {
            padding: 15px 20px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            display: none;
        }

        .success-message {
            background: rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 199, 89, 0.3);
            color: #34c759;
        }

        .error-message {
            background: rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.3);
            color: #ff3b30;
        }

        .success-message.show,
        .error-message.show {
            display: block;
        }

        .stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .stat-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 20px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .stat-value {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #25d366;
            margin-bottom: 5px;
        }

        .stat-label {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
        }

        /* Phone Preview */
        .phone-preview {
            position: sticky;
            top: 20px;
        }

        .phone-container {
            width: 350px;
            height: 700px;
            background: #000;
            border-radius: 35px;
            padding: 20px 15px;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }

        .phone-screen {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e5ddd5 0%, #d1c7b8 100%);
            border-radius: 25px;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .whatsapp-header {
            background: #075e54;
            height: 60px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 0 16px;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .contact-avatar {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: #25d366;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: white;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .contact-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .contact-name {
            color: white;
            font-size: 1rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .contact-status {
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
        }

        .chat-area {
            flex: 1;
            padding: 20px 16px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            height: calc(100% - 60px);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .no-messages {
            flex: 1;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            color: #666;
            font-style: italic;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .message-bubble {
            background: #dcf8c6;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            max-width: 80%;
            margin-left: auto;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .message-bubble:after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 8px;
            right: -8px;
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-left: 8px solid #dcf8c6;
            border-top: 8px solid transparent;
            border-bottom: 8px solid transparent;
        }

        .message-text {
            color: #303030;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            line-height: 1.4;
            word-wrap: break-word;
        }

        .message-time {
            color: #667781;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            text-align: right;
            margin-top: 4px;
        }

        .media-preview-whatsapp {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            overflow: hidden;
            max-width: 200px;
        }

        .image-preview-whatsapp {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            max-height: 150px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .video-preview-whatsapp {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            max-height: 150px;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .video-overlay {
            position: relative;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-top: -75px;
            margin-bottom: 75px;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .play-button {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
            color: white;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 1.2rem;
        }

        .audio-preview-whatsapp {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            max-width: 250px;
        }

        .audio-icon {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            color: #075e54;
        }

        .audio-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .audio-name {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #303030;
            margin-bottom: 2px;
        }

        .audio-duration {
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: #667781;
        }

        .audio-controls {
            display: none;
        }

        .document-preview-whatsapp {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 12px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            max-width: 250px;

        async function addGroupByLink() {

            if (!selectedConnection) {

            if (!codeMatch) {
                showGroupValidationError('Link inv√°lido. N√£o foi poss√≠vel extrair o c√≥digo do grupo.');
                return;
